page.description: Displays a numeric keypad for entering number values.

discussion.p: The *[ui:[Editor-NumericKeyPad]]* control can be added to a UX Component to add a custom numeric keypad for entering numeric values.

section.important: This control must be placed inside an *[link:EditorSet@ux container editorset container type]* container.

description.p: The editor, as shown below, displays a keypad that allows the user to enter numbers. When editing a value using the numeric keypad, the native keyboard on a mobile device is not used.
A configuration genie allows you to specify various settings for the keypad.
To insert a Numeric Key Pad editor, select *[ui:[Editor-NumericKeyPad]]* from the list of controls in the Defined Controls section.
To configure the Numeric KeyPad editor, click the smart field for the Editor configuration genie property in the FormView builder on the Fields tab.
The configuration genie (shown below) allows you to configure various settings for the keypad.

item.name: Maximum number of characters
item.description: The maximum number of characters the user can enter. Set to *[ui:-1]* for no limit.

item.name: Align
item.description: Defines the alignment of value in the display area. Can be *[ui:left]*, *[ui:center]*, or *[ui:right]*.

item.name: Scale
item.description: If the value is longer than can fit in the display area, the text can be automatically scaled so that the full value can be seen. If unchecked, the text can be scrolled.

item.name: Allow negative values
item.description: If checked, adds the "-" symbol to the keypad so negative values can be entered.

item.name: Allow decimal values
item.description: If checked, adds the *[ui:Decimal character]* to the keypad so decimal values can be entered.

item.name: Maximum decimal places
item.description: Defines the maximum number of decimal places the user can enter. Enter *[ui:-1]* for no limit. This option is only available if *[ui:Allow decimal values]* is checked.

item.name: Decimal character
item.description: The decimal character to use. This option is only available if *[ui:Allow decimal values]* is checked.

item.name: Has custom keys
item.description: If checked, up to two additional custom keys can be added to the keypad.

item.name: Show primary custom key
item.description: If checked, the primary custom key will be shown in the keypad. This option is only available if *[ui:Has custom keys]* is checked.

item.name: Primary custom key label
item.description: The label shown for the Primary custom key. This option is only available if *[ui:Show primary custom key]* is checked.

item.name: Primary custom key value(s)
item.description: Enter one or more values in a comma delimited list. If you enter more than one value,when the user taps on this key, a pop-up menu showing all custom values will be shown. This option is only available if *[ui:Show primary custom key]* is checked.

item.name: Show secondary custom key
item.description: If checked, the secondary custom key will be shown in the keypad. This option is only available if *[ui:Has custom keys]* is checked.

item.name: Secondary custom key label
item.description: The label shown for the Secondary custom key. This option is only available if *[ui:Show secondary custom key]* is checked.

item.name: Secondary custom key value(s)
item.description: Enter one or more values in a comma delimited list. If you enter more than one value,when the user taps on this key, a pop-up menu showing all custom values will be shown. This option is only available if *[ui:Show secondary custom key]* is checked.
